mapper.insert: insert into pg_attribute (attrelid, attname, atttypid, attstattarget, attlen, attnum, attndims, attcacheoff, atttypmod, attbyval, attstorage, attalign, attnotnull, atthasdef, attidentity, attisdropped, attislocal, attinhcount, attcollation, attacl, attoptions, attfdwoptions) values (#{attrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{atttypid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attstattarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attlen,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{attnum,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{attndims,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attcacheoff,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{atttypmod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attbyval,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attstorage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attalign,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attnotnull,jdbcType=BIT}, #{atthasdef,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attidentity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{attisdropped,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attislocal,jdbcType=BIT}, #{attinhcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attcollation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{attacl,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{attoptions,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{attfdwoptions,jdbcType=ARRAY})
mapper.select: select attrelid, attname, atttypid, attstattarget, attlen, attnum, attndims, attcacheoff, atttypmod, attbyval, attstorage, attalign, attnotnull, atthasdef, attidentity, attisdropped, attislocal, attinhcount, attcollation, attacl, attoptions, attfdwoptions from pg_attribute
